# Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview

This is a professional web development business website built with Angular frontend and Express TypeScript backend. It's designed as a business website (not a portfolio) to showcase web development services.

## Key Technologies

### Frontend (Angular)
- Angular 17 with standalone components
- TypeScript for type safety
- SCSS for styling
- Reactive forms for the contact form
- Router for navigation
- Modern, responsive design

### Backend (Express/TypeScript)
- Express.js with TypeScript
- Nodemailer for email handling
- Express-validator for input validation
- Rate limiting and security middleware
- CORS configuration
- Environment-based configuration

## Code Style Guidelines

### TypeScript
- Use strict typing
- Prefer interfaces over types for object shapes
- Use async/await over promises
- Include proper error handling

### Angular
- Use standalone components
- Implement reactive forms with validation
- Follow Angular style guide
- Use OnPush change detection where appropriate
- Proper component lifecycle management

### SCSS
- Use BEM methodology for class naming
- Mobile-first responsive design
- CSS Grid and Flexbox for layouts
- Consistent color scheme and typography

## Project Structure

- `frontend/` - Angular application
- `backend/` - Express API server
- Root level has scripts for running both simultaneously

## Business Context

This is a web development business website for "Edwards Web Development" offering:
- Custom website development
- Web applications
- E-commerce solutions
- Maintenance and support
- API development
- Performance optimization

The site should maintain a professional, business-focused tone and design.
